entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:49 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of light snow this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
